page.title: 19POST OFFICE,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: Llangollen Post Office is situated in {Berwyn Street.}It has{seventeen staff, one head postmistress,counterstaff and postmen.The{Head Office}is situated in{Wrexham.}There are two deliveries per day in the town and one delivery in rural areas.There are four collections in the town and two in some rural areas.There are{eleven vehicles used at the post office-five Landrovers,one Ford Escort,one Metro and four Marinas.The post office handles{two thousand letters per day in the sorting office.Collections of non-local mail are taken to{Wrexham each{day.Automatic sorting}is now being introduced.The uniform for postmen is to be changed soon and the men and women will be provided with shirts,ties and shoes in addition.
